articles.title: Alonso to run title-winning Renault R25 in Abu Dhabi to celebrate the team's transition to Alpine - Formula 1 RSS UK
articles.description: Two-time Formula 1 champion Fernando Alonso will demonstrate his championship-winning 2005 R25 during the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix weekend to mark his return to F1 and Renault’s re-branding as Alpine in 2021.
articles.content:
Two-time Formula 1 champion Fernando Alonso will demonstrate his championship-winning 2005 R25 ahead of the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix to mark his return to F1 and Renaults re-branding to Alpine in 2021.
